description: The polymer body of a Glock 19 magazine.  It's missing the base plate, which makes it unusable as a magazine.  Attach a base plate to it to make it usable.

variants.description: The polymer body of a Glock 19 magazine.  Without a base plate to hold up the spring inside, it cannot be used as a proper magazine.  Attach a base plate to make it usable.  <variant:black>

//weight: Glock 19 with empty magazine (23.63 oz = 669.9 g) - Glock 19 without magazine (21.16 oz = 599.88 g) = 70.02 g
